name: Terre d'Hermès Eau de Toilette
description: A fragrance that connects man to his origins, to the sources of his creative power. A woody, vegetal, and mineral scent.

name: Terre d'Hermès Parfum
description: A denser and more concentrated version of Terre d'Hermès, intensifying its mineral and woody notes.

name: Terre d'Hermès Eau Intense Vétiver
description: A new expression of Terre d'Hermès, highlighting the power of vetiver, fresh and earthy.

name: Terre d'Hermès Eau Givrée
description: The heat of ice. A fresh and intense fragrance that captures the sensation of icy breath.

name: Eau des Merveilles Eau de Toilette
description: A surprising and magical woody-amber fragrance for women, without a single floral note.

name: Elixir des Merveilles
description: A deeper, more gourmand interpretation of Eau des Merveilles, with candied orange and rich resins.
notes_base: Sandalwood, Oakmoss, Patchouli, Tonka Bean, Incense, Cedar

name: Eau des Merveilles Bleue
description: A marine and woody interpretation, inspired by the deep blue of the ocean.

name: L'Ombre des Merveilles
description: A sensual and mysterious take, playing with light and shadow, highlighting smoky and tonka notes.

name: Twilly d'Hermès Eau de Parfum
description: The scent of the Hermès girls, a daring fragrance woven with striking ginger and sensual tuberose.

name: Twilly d'Hermès Eau Poivrée
description: A spirited and impertinent scent, sparkling with vibrant pink peppercorn, tender rose, and captivating patchouli.

name: Twilly d'Hermès Ginger
description: A new, radiant, and joyful interpretation, bursting with the freshness of ginger.

name: Jour d'Hermès Eau de Parfum
description: A celebration of femininity, highlighting the beauty of flowers from dawn till dusk.
notes_middle: Gardenia, Sweet Pea, Green Notes, White Flowers

name: Jour d'Hermès Absolu
description: The absolute essence of femininity, a vibrant and sensual floral composition.

name: Jour d'Hermès Gardénia
description: A specific focus on the enchanting gardenia, highlighting its creamy and intense facets.

name: Un Jardin sur le Nil
description: A green and woody scent, a stroll in the island-gardens of the Nile at Aswan, full of life and light.

name: Un Jardin en Méditerranée
description: A fragrant, woody, and refreshing Mediterranean garden, evoking sunshine and shadows.
notes_base: Fig Leaf, Cypress, Musk, Juniper Berries, Pistachio, Cedar

name: Un Jardin sur le Toit
description: A living and sparkling garden in the heart of Paris, nestled on a rooftop at Hermès.

name: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li
description: A tranquil and poetic Chinese garden, where jasmine, kumquat, and water accord flourish.

name: Un Jardin sur la Lagune
description: A secret garden in Venice, gentle and comforting, with notes of magnolia and pittosporum.

name: Un Jardin à Cythère
description: A fragrant garden on the Greek island of Kythira, combining grasses with olive wood and fresh pistachios.

name: Eau d'Orange Verte
description: The founding cologne, a sparkling explosion of citrus notes, fresh and vibrant.

name: Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate
description: A vibrant and tangy cologne, bursting with the freshness of rhubarb and white musk.

name: Eau de Pamplemousse Rose
description: A sparkling and tangy cologne, combining the freshness of grapefruit with the tenderness of rose.

name: Eau de Citron Noir
description: A surprising and intensely fresh cologne, centered around the smoky and tangy notes of black lime.

name: Eau de Basilic Pourpre
description: A lively and radiant cologne, celebrating the aromatic freshness of purple basil.

name: Eau de Mandarine Ambrée
description: A radiant and enveloping cologne, combining the lively zest of mandarin with the soft warmth of amber.

name: Voyage d'Hermès
description: A lively and reassuring fragrance, new and familiar, a woody fresh, ambery scent.

name: 24 Faubourg
description: A luminous and warm white floral chypre, an invitation to travel and explore the sun.
notes_middle: Black Elderberry, Iris, Orange Blossom, Gardenia, Jasmine

name: Calèche
description: A timeless floral aldehyde fragrance, embodying ultimate feminine elegance.
notes_base: Sandalwood, Vetiver, Oakmoss, Amber, Tonka Bean

name: Kelly Calèche
description: A light, airy, and feminine leather fragrance, playful yet sophisticated.

name: Equipage
description: A classic woody-spicy fragrance for men, embodying an elegant and virile masculinity.
notes_top: Nutmeg, Pine Tree Needles, Bergamot, Clary Sage, Brazilian Rosewood
notes_base: Oakmoss, Vetiver, Patchouli, Tonka Bean, Amber

name: Bel Ami
description: A warm and sensual woody leather fragrance for men, evoking a refined masculinity.
notes_top: Lemon, Bergamot, Mandarin Orange, Clary Sage

name: Ambre Narguilé
description: A warm and sensual fragrance, an ode to amber, honey, and oriental tobacco.
notes_base: Tonka Bean, Vanilla, Tobacco, Coumarin, Labdanum

name: Poivre Samarcande
description: A woody and spicy fragrance, inspired by the ancient Silk Road, featuring robust pepper.

name: Rose Ikebana
description: A delicate and vibrant rose, balancing floral notes with crisp rhubarb, inspired by Japanese floral art.

name: Vetiver Tonka
description: A warm and gourmand vetiver, combining the earthy root with sweet, roasted tonka bean.

name: Santal Massoïa
description: A creamy and milky woody fragrance, combining sandalwood with the softness of massoia bark.

name: Cuir d'Ange
description: A light and delicate leather fragrance, like an angel's skin, soft and powdery.

name: Myrrhe Églantine
description: A beautiful blend of myrrh and wild rose, evoking a walk in an ancient, fragrant garden.

name: Epice Marine
description: A unique blend of marine and spicy notes, reminiscent of a sea breeze carrying the scent of spices.

name: Cardamusc
description: An aromatic and musky fragrance, centered around the warmth of cardamom and musk.

name: Agar Ébène
description: A deep and smoky woody fragrance, highlighting the richness of agarwood (oud) and frankincense.

name: Cèdre Sambac
description: A woody and floral fragrance, combining the strength of cedar with the softness of jasmine sambac.

name: Hiver en Mai
description: A poetic and evocative scent, capturing the freshness of spring with a hint of winter's crispness.
